wikipedia_page.main: David Charles Erskine (1866 – 26 May 1922) was a British Liberal Party politician.

response: *David Charles Erskine (1866–1922), Chairman of the National Galleries of Scotland Board of Trustees and Liberal MP for West Perthshire (1906–1910)Harrow, 1800–1911, p. 567
*David Charles Erskine (1866–1922), British Member of Parliament for West Perthshire, 1906–1910

He won the election, after which he was consulted by Joseph Chamberlain on reconstruction measures after the Boer War. At the following general election, in 1906 he lost the seat to David Charles Erskine in a Liberal landslide.
